mapper.select: SELECT product_id, product_name, price, image_url, max_quantity, sell_quantity, PRODUCT.category_id, CATEGORY.category_name FROM PRODUCT JOIN CATEGORY USING (category_id)

SELECT product_id, product_name, price, image_url, max_quantity, sell_quantity, PRODUCT.category_id, CATEGORY.category_name FROM PRODUCT JOIN CATEGORY USING (category_id) WHERE PRODUCT.product_id = #{product_id}

SELECT ORDER_INFORMATION.reservation_id, PRODUCT.product_id, PRODUCT.product_name, PRODUCT.image_url, ORDER_INFORMATION.quantity, PRODUCT.price * ORDER_INFORMATION.quantity AS part_price FROM PRODUCT JOIN ORDER_INFORMATION ON PRODUCT.product_id = ORDER_INFORMATION.product_id AND ORDER_INFORMATION.reservation_id = #{reservation_id}

SELECT product_id, product_name, price, image_url, max_quantity, sell_quantity, PRODUCT.category_id, CATEGORY.category_name FROM PRODUCT JOIN CATEGORY USING (category_id) WHERE PRODUCT.category_id=#{category_id}
